sense.def:
Clearance
je odstranitev starih ali nezaželenih stavb, dreves ali drugih stvari z nekega območja.

seg.quote: He was responsible for slum clearance and rehousing programmes.

sense.def:
Kadar dobimo
clearance for something
, za tisto dobimo uradno dovoljenje.

seg.quote: They were still awaiting clearance to start the engines.
